divs: Sighting DetailsI was making a video then my dad called me to go outside and told me to look up and I saw a triangle and the lights were blue and switching it was spinning and hovering. I was frightened and also amazed. I lost site when it went across the trees behind my garage.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Murfreesboro
There were no other sightings in Murfreesboro on or around August 6th 2013
